about_the_game:
NATURAL DECOR PACK


Make your aquatic friends feel right at home with the Natural Decor DLC pack! This pack contains 14 nature-themed objects and decorations to play with, with themed items for both freshwater and saltwater tanks! Add some leaf litter and cholla wood for your blackwater fish, a flowing Cherry Blossom tree for your ornamental fish, or some shiny marine shells and sea glass for your sea dwellers!

INCLUDES:

- Sparse Bubbler
- Leaf Litter
- Cholla Wood
- Coconut Cave
- Tree Stump
- Spider Wood
- Mossy Bonsai Tree
- Cherry Blossom Bonsai Tree
- Dragon Stone (small, medium, and large)
- Big Conch
- Seashells
- Sea Glass

name: Fishlets - Natural Decor Pack
short_description: Customize your tanks with 14 nature-themed decor objects in the Fishlets - Natural Decor DLC Pack! Create a blackwater haven using the leaf litter and cholla wood, add some beauty and serenity with the flowing bonsai trees, or decorate your marine tanks with shiny sea glass and seashells.
